name: Sugar Neko
description:
Paw McCartny is a cute hungry cat and he wants to eat all Christmas snacks.

You're responsible for taking care of him and not letting him finish the candies.

To play with Paw you can use:
- Laser: Point and distract Paw for a long time (may run out of battery).
- Bells: Paw likes it, but sometimes not (don't overuse it).
- Ball of Wool: Distract Paw's paws for a while, but takes some time to get another one.
